title: "github example"
output: html_document
---



```{r}

library(readxl)
megacorp <- read_excel(".../data/megacorp.xlsx")
str(megacorp)

```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)

graph2a <- ggplot(megacorp, aes  (Unit, Profit, color = ProductLine)) +   
  geom_point()

graph2a_alternative <- ggplot(megacorp, aes(ProductLine, Profit, fill = Unit)) +   
  stat_summary(fun=mean, geom="bar")
graph2a_alternative

levels(megacorp$Unit)
graph2a


```
